name: DOMUMX
0:
”Alexa, turn on the lights”
”Alexa, show me the living room camera”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
Welcome to DOMUM X, your trusted smart home companion. DOMUM X empowers you to effortlessly control your connected devices, creating a seamless, secure, and energy-efficient living environment. With DOMUM X, your voice is the key to unlocking the full potential of your smart home.

**Linking Steps**
1. Download our “DOMUM X” app in app market, then register an account (or log in directly if you already have an account);
2. Configure our devices in “DOMUM X” app and change appropriate name for your devices;
3. Open the Alexa app on your smartphone or tablet.
4. Tap on the "more" icon in the lower right corner.
5. Select "Skills & Games".
6. In the search bar, type “DOMUM X” and press Enter.
7. Find the “DOMUM X” skill and tap on it.
8. Click the "Enable" button to link your Alexa device with “DOMUM X”.

**Voice Instructions**
To control your smart home devices with DOMUM X, simply say:
- "Alexa, turn on the lights"
- "Alexa, set the thermostat to 72 degrees"
- "Alexa, lock the front door"
- "Alexa, show me the living room camera"
- "Alexa, set a scene for movie night"

DOMUM X makes managing your smart home a breeze. Try it out today for a more convenient and secure living experience.
